job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: 3+ years of hands-on experience in Site Reliability, DevOps and/or Software Delivery for commercial large scale cloud software or servicesGood understanding of public cloud offerings such as Azure, Google Cloud or AWSExperience with coding languages (C++, C#, Java, .NET) and proficiency in debugging, and live-site troubleshooting during an outageStrong background in monitoring, disaster recovery, and automationExcellent communication skills both oral and writtenExperience with Kubernetes, Docker, Terraform or other Infrastructure as Code, CI/CD preferredOur ideal candidate will demonstrate strong customer empathy, show a strong bias for action, be adaptable and possess strong interpersonal skill
